target.name: cities
target.query: SELECT cant_residencia as city, prov_residencia as province, count(*) as confirmed, cod_prov_res as cartodbId, cod_cant_res as cantonId FROM covid19ec.msp WHERE clasificacion_caso='Confirmado' GROUP BY cant_residencia, prov_residencia, cod_prov_res, cod_cant_res ORDER BY cod_prov_res, cod_cant_res

target.name: onset_of_symptoms
target.query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(inicio_sintomas, '%Y-%m-%d') AS date, COUNT(*) AS total FROM covid19ec.msp WHERE clasificacion_caso='Confirmado' GROUP BY inicio_sintomas

target.name: age_group
target.query: SELECT REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(grupo_edad, "mas de ", "+"),"de ", "")," a ", " - "),"a√±os", ""),"meses", "") as `group`,count(*) as confirmed FROM covid19ec.msp WHERE clasificacion_caso='Confirmado' GROUP BY grupo_edad

target.name: deaths_by_province
target.query: SELECT prov_residencia, cod_prov_res as cartodbId, COUNT(*) as numberofDeaths FROM msp WHERE condicion_paciente='Muerto' AND clasificacion_caso='Confirmado' group by prov_residencia, cod_prov_res
